text_block_list.text:
Okay, pumpkins, bell peppers, and corn… 
Yup, we've got everything they've asked for!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Thanks for keeping track of the shopping list Chiyo-chan♪ 
I'm getting so excited for the barbeque at the end of 
the summer camp!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
I'm also excited! After all, summer and barbeque always 
go together! And when you think of barbeque you think 
of your class president!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
Let's all work together to follow the rules and make sure 
no one gets burnt! Let's eat our fill and have heaps of fun!! 
Hahahahaha!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
That being said, we still haven't bought carrots. 
Are we really going to be okay without some?
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
I heard that they were bringing them 
by the truckload directly to the campsite!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Oh, I see!
text_block_list.name: Both

text_block_list.text:
But anyways, as Baku-chan said, we need 
to make sure to eat a bunch and have fun! So…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
When we get back to campus I need to work really hard. 
I still haven't made up for the time I missed in Spring 
due to my injury!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Laurel-san… Please don't overdo it! I can tell you've been 
pushing yourself really hard during this Summer camp as well!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, don't worry about me♪ 
Chiyo-chan, you of all people should know that, right? 
After all, I'm good at dealing with injuries!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Woah! Look at that watermelon over there, it's so big and 
looks absolutely delicious! I bet everyone would be happy 
if we brought it back for them! Give me a second you two!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Mhm! That's how Laurel-san always is!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
She's… so strong. She's always been like that, 
even before she came to the academy… 
Even when we trained together in the "Victory Club."
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
"One must always be strong-willed!" 
"One must live full of positivity and energy!" 
That's what all members of the Victory Club are taught!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
And of course our names are synonymous with strong flowers!! 
As such, "No matter the difficulty, one must always push through."
text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O

text_block_list.text:
We must always have fortitude. 
And in that respect, Laurel is second to none…
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text: Baku-chan, Chiyo-chan, sorry for making you wait!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Hehehe, their watermelons looked so delicious that I ended 
up buying a bunch! But don't worry, I'll carry them all back!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text:
Oh, also, if your bags get too heavy on our 
way back just let me know! I'll carry them for you♪
text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel

text_block_list.text: Wait, Laurel-san! I'm still worried about you!!
text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O

text_block_list.text:
Hey… come here for a sec. 
Isn't that girl's plate lookin' a little empty, 
why don't we give her some more carrots…?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text:
No way no way!! That girl… isn't she 
from that like super famous Grand Family…!?
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B

text_block_list.text: Thank you for the meal.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
Hey hey hey hey hey!! 
Milady, are you trying some of the foods!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
I have just finished my meal. 
Therefore, I am leaving.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text: Hold on, wait! M-Milady!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
I said hold on, weit! Why're you at the beach when we're havin' 
a rad BBQ!? You're gonna go for a swim!? I'm guessin' you 
wanted to swim so bad that you couldn't hold it in anymore?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
I do not have any plans to swim… 
I simply wanted to do a bit of running after my meal.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
You're doin' some training!? Ehhh, for realz!? 
What about the BBQ!? What about the summer party!? 
You're not gonna come and get hyped!?!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
I ate as much as was necessary already. 
You can feel free to return to your party though.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
That's not the point!! Ungh, Milady, such a buzzkill… 
You're legit super ultra salty everyday!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text: Umm… are you done?
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
Wait, this isn't over yet! I'll never give up! 
Umm, well if you don't wanna join us for 
the BBQ, what about the watermelon splitting!?
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh, hahh… 
Hmmmmh―!!
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text: Alright, that went well…
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text: Miracle-san… great work.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
Ruby! Huh, what about the barbeque…? 
Did you manage to get out of it? 
Ahaha, I guess I shouldn't be one to talk.
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text: Your form… it was quite brilliant.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
Really!? Thanks! That helps me 
feel more confident in my abilities.
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text: Is… that so?
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text: Anyways, Ruby, are you going for a run?
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text:
That is correct. Even if it's our last day of 
this camp, we cannot neglect our training.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
"Be brilliant. Be the best. And always shine the brightest." 
That is my family's motto… 
And as such I must adhere to that duty.
text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby

text_block_list.text:
Got it. Umm, I know that it's a little different from 
what you're talking about, but… I have to win too. 
I need to repay all of the people that saved me.
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Uwaaah!! Miracle, Milady, what're you two doin'!? 
We're s'posed to be havin' fun!!
text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios

text_block_list.text:
Helios! Ahahaha, you're always so energetic! 
But don't worry about me, I'm having a blast right now!
text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle

text_block_list.text:
Hehe… The wind is breathing in new life. 
A noble, heavenly wind. An earnest, dry wind. A cheerful gale.
text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr

text_block_list.text:
However, I will be the breeze that sweeps them all away. 
Ahh… I can already smell the end of summer.
text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
